definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet

sentences.english: Weather satellites have observed a ring of volcanic ash girdling the earth.
sentences.chinese: 氣象衛星觀測到一個環繞地球的火山灰帶。

sentences.english: Methods of monitoring moisture of upper soil layer with NOAA-11 data are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了用極軌氣象衛星資料監測表層土壤溼度的方法。

sentences.english: It has tremendous economic benefits and significant roles in developing Polar Or-biting Meteorological Satellite(POMS).
sentences.chinese: 發展極軌氣象衛星具有多方面的重要作用和經濟效益。

sentences.english: The Chinese used as the target for the test one of their own obsolete weather satellites.
sentences.chinese: 中國使用一顆他們自己的廢棄氣象衛星作爲標靶。

sentences.english: Finally, as an example, calculation has been made for an infrared spectrometer on board a polar orbit meteorological satellite.
sentences.chinese: 最後以極軌氣象衛星上的紅外分光計爲例進行了計算。

sentences.english: Shoots down own weather satellite to test its ballisticmissile capability.
sentences.chinese: 擊落自己的氣象衛星以測試彈道導彈能力。

sentences.english: China tested an anti-satellite missile by destroying one of its weather satellites.
sentences.chinese: 中國通過摧毀他的一個氣象衛星試驗一種反衛星導彈。

definition: amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines

pinyin: guo2 ji4 dian4 xin4 lian2 meng2
Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

definition: (idiom) to freely air one's views/to be heard far and wide/to attract a lot of attention
